response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance the efficiency and profitability of your operations. Given its high quality and unique features, I understand its value might be subjective, but based on our research and industry standards, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $18,000. This offer is designed to provide you with an exceptional opportunity to benefit from this investment without breaking your budget. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information to make an informed decision.", "product_price": 18000}
